channel.title: The Dark Hour: Nin
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The Dark Hour: Nin" - Need help beating the nin portion

item.title: Re: The Dark Hour: Nin
item.content:encoded: Use a +6 str team, and the 3 jutsus that take 20 stamina for 3 str and 10 range.

item.title: The Dark Hour: Nin
item.content:encoded:
I need help with The Dark Hour, the special mission.

For Tai I use: Hermano/Shorty Lv.2/Sporty with Bone Daddy & Kido: Iron Maiden. SUCCESSFUL

For Gen I use: Super Robo Girls Team with Kido: Harder Better. SUCCESSFUL

For Nin I use: Robogirl Lv.2/Scary/Shorty Lv.2 with Kido: Slayer. 18/20 Successes achieved. FAILURE

Here are my Permanent Items:

Soul Glove
Professor's Hat
Blue Flower Hairpin
Heck Butterfly
Sword of the Reaper
Shortbunny
Monster Mask
Glowing Mood Ring
Ninja Puppet
Ninja Dog
Trench Knife
Giant Fan
Swallowtail Butterfly
Basic Ninja Gear
Utility Belt
Silver Hairpin
Sascha
Letter of Marque
Knapsack
Goo Stabilization Recipe
Substitute Soul Reaper Badge
Pink Bouquet
Ninja-Mas Star
Soul Candy
Chakra Armor
Helper Pin
RingEye
Desert Robes
Captain's Jacket
Necklace of the First HoCage
Counterfeit Permit
11DBHK's Birthday Hat
Dog Collar
K-Dog's Headband
Coolness Badge
Hollow Leg
Hall Pass
Reaper Blood - Shikai
Dartboard
Warbound
Awesome Pants

I am considering trying switching Shorty Lv.2 for Fletch and then trying using that team with Kido: Slayer.
